## Description {#details}

Some generic instructions have operands that can be mapped to either fprb or gprb e.g.

for G&#95;LOAD we consider only operand 0 as ambiguous, operand 1 is always gprb since it is a pointer. This class provides containers for MI&#39;s ambiguous: DefUses : MachineInstrs that use one of MI&#39;s ambiguous def operands. UseDefs : MachineInstrs that define MI&#39;s ambiguous use operands.

Definition at line 122 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipsregisterbankinfo-h">MipsRegisterBankInfo.h</a>.

### skipCopiesIncoming() {#ac6376f181505855d7f2728b9fbb6a999}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MachineInstr &#42; MipsRegisterBankInfo::AmbiguousRegDefUseContainer::skipCopiesIncoming (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MI) const</>}>
Skip copy instructions until we get to a non-copy instruction or to a copy with phys register as use.

Used during search for UseDefs. %1 = COPY $a1 &lt;- we want this one. %2 = COPY %1 MI = %3 = COPY %2

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipsregisterbankinfo-h/#l00141">141</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipsregisterbankinfo-h">MipsRegisterBankInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipsregisterbankinfo-cpp/#l00169">169</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipsregisterbankinfo-cpp">MipsRegisterBankInfo.cpp</a>.

### skipCopiesOutgoing() {#a561303d2b0f3bc7bee1de993076e645d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MachineInstr &#42; MipsRegisterBankInfo::AmbiguousRegDefUseContainer::skipCopiesOutgoing (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MI) const</>}>
Skip copy instructions until we get to a non-copy instruction or to a copy with phys register as def.

Used during search for DefUses. MI : %5 = COPY %4 %6 = COPY %5 $v0 = COPY %6 &lt;- we want this one.
